name: Kidz Bingoz
description:
Specially for the kids and those who never grow up a classic casino bingo-hall-game.
Just get a card (up to four) and then start to daub the numbers given on top of the board. When you get a line (horizontal, vertical or diagonal) hit the "Bingoz"-button at the bottom.
But if you hit "Bingoz" and where wrong you will freez for a short time!
So are you the lucky one who can fill all four cards and cry "Bingoz!" …

For the Kidz out there – an other fine «Z-App» from Skullz23.
